Activity: Log in to the system and check emails. Review the existing EHR database schema for influenza data storage, focusing on tables related to patient demographics, diagnoses, and vaccinations.
Document any gaps or inconsistencies in the current schema that may affect influenza data storage. Organize findings for discussion with the team.
Email @his-1 and @his-2 to request clarification on specific EHR data elements related to influenza. Include questions about required fields and data types.
Begin drafting a preliminary design for new tables to store influenza-related data, including fields for patient ID, vaccination status, diagnosis date, and symptoms.
Continue refining the table design, ensuring alignment with the hospital's data standards. Cross-reference with existing tables to avoid redundancy.
Email @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to discuss potential integration points for the new tables within the EHR system.
Review feedback from the Health Informatics team and update the table design accordingly.
Document the day's progress and prepare a summary for tomorrow's tasks.
